overview: On Friday November 17 2006, a group of Australia's top performers and two chart-topping international acts joined forces to help Make Poverty History. In a ground-breaking concert, more than 14,000 music fans converged on the Sidney Myer Music Bowl to be part of this historic event, while tens of thousands more watched the concert at live sites and online around the nation.
tagline: "Together, we can - and will - Make Poverty History."
title: Make Poverty History - Music Concert
